sourcesContent:
/**
 * Main Application Entry Point
 * Initializes Vue app with all plugins and configurations
 */

import Vue from 'vue'
import App from './App.vue'
import router from './router'
import store from './store'
import Vuelidate from 'vuelidate'
import { BootstrapVue, IconsPlugin } from 'bootstrap-vue'

// Import Bootstrap and BootstrapVue CSS
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'
import 'bootstrap-vue/dist/bootstrap-vue.css'
// Import custom claymorphism styles
import './assets/claymorphism.css'

// Install BootstrapVue - provides UI components
Vue.use(BootstrapVue)
// Install BootstrapVue Icons - provides icon components
Vue.use(IconsPlugin)
// Install Vuelidate - provides form validation
Vue.use(Vuelidate)

// Disable production tip in console
Vue.config.productionTip = false

/**
 * Create and mount Vue application
 * - router: Vue Router for navigation
 * - store: Vuex store for state management
 * - render: Render App component
 * - $mount: Mount to #app element in index.html
 */
new Vue({
  router,
  store,
  render: h => h(App),
}).$mount('#app')
